title: Mystika
description: A realm where the Veil between worlds has grown thin, allowing otherworldly energies to seep through. The Crystalborn, descendants of those touched by these energies, navigate a world where magic and reality blur. Ancient elven kingdoms coexist with shifter tribes, all bound by the ever-present threat of Veil-storms that can reshape reality itself.

rules.name: Veil Stability
rules.description: The integrity of the barrier between worlds affects all magical phenomena

rules.name: Crystal Resonance
rules.description: The harmony between Crystalborn and their crystalline powers

rules.name: Faction Tension
rules.description: The balance between Elven Courts, Shifter Tribes, and Crystalborn Orders

differentiators.title: Veil-Touched Bonds
differentiators.description: Relationships are deepened by shared experiences with Veil-storms and crystal resonance

differentiators.title: Three-Way Balance
differentiators.description: Elven Courts, Shifter Tribes, and Crystalborn Orders vie for influence over Veil-stability

differentiators.title: Veil-Driven Agency
differentiators.description: NPCs pursue their own agendas, often influenced by Veil-storms and crystal resonance

title: Aetherium
tagline: The Aetherium Reaches - Where Consciousness is Currency
description: In the sprawling neon-lit megacities of Aetherium, human consciousness has become the ultimate commodity. Neural implants allow thoughts to be digitized, memories to be traded, and minds to be uploaded to corporate servers. The Aetherium Reaches stretch between towering arcologies where the wealthy live in digital luxury while the masses struggle in the physical world below.

rules.name: Corporate Control
rules.description: The pervasive influence of megacorporations on daily life and consciousness

rules.name: Neural Freedom
rules.description: The remaining pockets of free thought and unmonitored consciousness

rules.name: Aetherium Stability
rules.description: The integrity of the digital consciousness network that connects all minds

differentiators.title: Neural Bonds
differentiators.description: Relationships are deepened through shared neural experiences and memory exchanges

differentiators.title: Corporate vs Underground
differentiators.description: Megacorporations control the Aetherium while underground hackers fight for digital freedom

differentiators.title: Digital Consciousness
differentiators.description: NPCs exist as both physical and digital entities with their own neural agendas

title: Voidreach
tagline: Space exploration where the unknown holds both promise and peril
description: Humanity's first steps into the vast unknown of space have revealed wonders beyond imagination. But with each new discovery comes new dangers, and the line between exploration and exploitation grows ever thinner.

rules.name: Exploration Progress
rules.description: How far humanity has ventured into the unknown

rules.name: Alien Relations
rules.description: The state of relations with discovered alien species

differentiators.title: Exploration vs Preservation

differentiators.title: Alien Autonomy

title: Whispercross Glade
tagline: Where Nature's Whispers Guide the Lost
description: A tranquil realm where ancient forests hold secrets and the very air seems to speak. Whispercross Glade is a place of healing and discovery, where travelers come to find themselves among the whispering trees and crystal-clear streams. The glade serves as a gentle introduction to the mysteries of the wider world.

rules.name: Nature Harmony
rules.description: The balance between civilization and the natural world

rules.name: Whisper Strength
rules.description: The power of the ancient whispers that guide travelers

rules.name: Glade Peace
rules.description: The tranquility and safety of the glade's protective magic

differentiators.title: Nature Bonds
differentiators.description: Relationships are deepened through shared experiences with the natural world and its spirits

differentiators.title: Guardians vs Seekers
differentiators.description: The balance between those who protect the glade and those who seek its secrets

differentiators.title: Spirit-Guided Agency
differentiators.description: NPCs are guided by the whispers of nature and their own spiritual journeys

title: Paragon City
tagline: Where Heroes Rise and Villains Fall
description: A sprawling metropolis where superpowered individuals fight for justice against criminal masterminds and supervillains. Paragon City is a place where ordinary people can become extraordinary heroes, but with great power comes great responsibility.

differentiators.title: Superpowered Agency
differentiators.description: NPCs have their own superpowers and agendas, both heroic and villainous

title: Veloria - Court of Hearts
tagline: Where Love and Intrigue Dance in Eternal Courts
description: A realm of eternal courts where love, romance, and political intrigue intertwine. Veloria is a place of beauty and elegance, where relationships are everything and every glance, every word, every gesture carries meaning. The Court of Hearts is where destinies are shaped by love and ambition.

title: Noctis Veil
description: A realm shrouded in eternal twilight, where ancient evils lurk in the shadows and the line between the living and the dead grows thin. Noctis Veil is a place of gothic horror and supernatural mystery, where brave souls must confront their deepest fears to uncover the truth.
